project.description: This is the released build for Release_3_3. Output is signed.

scm.module: org.eclipse.ecf/applications org.eclipse.ecf/compendium org.eclipse.ecf/doc org.eclipse.ecf/examples org.eclipse.ecf/framework org.eclipse.ecf/incubation org.eclipse.ecf/protocols org.eclipse.ecf/providers org.eclipse.ecf/releng org.eclipse.ecf/server-side org.eclipse.ecf/tests

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
ssh mkuppe@dev.eclipse.org 'rm -rf /home/data/httpd/download.eclipse.org/rt/ecf/3.3Test/helios/site.p2' ssh mkuppe@dev.eclipse.org 'rm -rf /home/data/httpd/download.eclipse.org/rt/ecf/3.3Test/helios/*.zip'
scp -r site.p2/ mkuppe@dev.eclipse.org:/home/data/httpd/download.eclipse.org/rt/ecf/3.3Test/helios ssh mkuppe@dev.eclipse.org 'chmod -R g+w /home/data/httpd/download.eclipse.org/rt/ecf/3.3Test/helios/site.p2'
# Buckminster 3.6 test -e ${WORKSPACE}/buckminster.output/${FEATURE_NAME}_*-eclipse.feature/site.p2.zip/${FEATURE_NAME}_*.zip && mv ${WORKSPACE}/buckminster.output/${FEATURE_NAME}_*-eclipse.feature/site.p2.zip/${FEATURE_NAME}_*.zip ${WORKSPACE} # Buckminster 3.5 test -e ${WORKSPACE}/buckminster.output/${FEATURE_NAME}_*-eclipse.feature/${FEATURE_NAME}_*.zip && mv ${WORKSPACE}/buckminster.output/${FEATURE_NAME}_*-eclipse.feature/${FEATURE_NAME}_*.zip ${WORKSPACE}
scp ${FEATURE_NAME}_*.zip mkuppe@dev.eclipse.org:/home/data/httpd/download.eclipse.org/rt/ecf/3.3Test/helios

hudson.plugins.setenv.SetEnvBuildWrapper.localVarText: SITE_SIGNING=true BUILD_ACTION=site.p2.zip SITE_INCLUDE_TOP=false SITE_PACK200=true FEATURE_NAME=org.eclipse.ecf.sdk MSPEC_NAME=org.eclipse.ecf.sdk.mspec ECF_P2_REPOSITORY=
